answers.answer: I don't think so I had gd with my first and they allowed me to breastfeed

Breastfeeding is really good to do cuz it will help decrease ur and babies chances of developing actual diabetes later on. That's what my counselor told me. She told me to breastfeed as long as I can.

question: Will having gd effect me wanting to breastfeed although its currently controlled.Just a quick ??
